mapper.insert: insert into member (member_num, id, pwd, name, phone, birth, email, zip_num, address1, address2, gender) values (member_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{zip_num}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{gender})
insert into member(member_num, id, email, name, provider )values(member_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{email}, #{name}, #{provider} )
